message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.  My initial offer is $1,150,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could come down to $1,125,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $1,100,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you consider $1,100,000?
